name: syntax-theme-base16-ocean
description: Base16 Ocean Syntax theme for Atom
readme:
# Base16 Ocean Syntax theme

Atom theme using the ever popular [base16][base16] ocean dark colors.

This theme can be activated by going to
the _Themes_ section in the Settings view (`cmd-,`) and selecting it from the
_Syntax Themes_ drop-down menu.

![](https://github.com/lynnwallenstein/base16-ocean-dark-theme/blob/master/sample-screenshot.png?raw=true)

[base16]: https://github.com/chriskempson/base16
